title: What are the characteristics of developed technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are 2 characteristics of developed technology: UsefulnessDeveloped technology should have purpose and be useful. 2. Reliability If a technology is “developed,” then I would expect it to work well and be reliable, otherwise I wouldn’t consider it to be developed. “Developed,” is qualitative, and technology is never fully developed. All technology is still advancing and becoming more developed!

Characteristics of technology.Technology is defined as “purposeful intervention by design”, and technological practice as the activity through which technological outcomes are created and have impact in the world. Technological outcomes are designed to enhance the capabilities of people and expand human possibilities.
